sentences.english: Secondly, should focus on building a long-term protection of the right to know potential buyer integrated mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 其次，應着力構建預購人知情權保護的長效綜合機制。

sentences.english: Each of the Pre-Order closing date is different, the customers please note.
sentences.chinese: 每次的預購截止日期都不同，顧客請注意。

sentences.english: Unicom's website has since started taking pre-orders for the Motorola device.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後，聯通網站已開始接受摩托羅拉手機的預購。

sentences.english: Can I book coach tickets here?
sentences.chinese: 你這裏可不可以預購長途汽車票？

sentences.english: Following on from the presales success of the album, their company gave S.
sentences.chinese: 因爲專輯預購大賣，唱片公司給S。

sentences.english: Customers can get them around 20-30 days after the pre-order closing date.
sentences.chinese: 顧客可在預購結束之後的20至30天內收到貨品。

sentences.english: My first choice will be online options trading.
sentences.chinese: 我的首選是在線股票預購買賣。

sentences.english: Advance procurement mechanisms for pandemic vaccine are under development.
sentences.chinese: 正在制定大流行性疫苗的預購機制。

sentences.english: Can I book ship tickets here?
sentences.chinese: 你這裏可不可以預購船票？

sentences.english: To protect the legal interest and equity of the house prebuyers, pre-register system should be implemented.
sentences.chinese: 爲保護商品房預購人合法權益，應建立預告登記制度。

definition: advance sale/to sell in advance/to book
to place an order/to book ahead
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
group buying/collective buying/buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group
to rush (to do sth urgent)/to try to be the first/to forestall
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
the number of showings of a movie, play etc/screening/performance
